text: Epse is a village in the municipality of Lochem, province of Gelderland, Netherlands. It lies south of the A1 motorway and north of Gorssel, which was a separate municipality encompassing Epse until 2005, when it was merged with Lochem. In 2018, the village had a population of 2,042. Statistische gegevens gemeente Lochem op 1 januari 2019, gemeente Lochem, p.2 The Dutch Reformed Church at its centre was built in 1930. ==References== ==External link== * Epse on plaatsengids.nl Category:Populated places in Gelderland Category:Lochem
title: Epse
